relation.text: was founded by James Brooke in 1862
was burnt to the ground twice in 1889
the Japanese occupation of Sarawak in 1941
installed a new Resident at Sibu in June 1942
death at Kuching Central Prison in 1950
continued even after the Sarawak independence in 1963
was upgraded to the municipality status in 1981
2011, 110th anniversary of Foochow settlement was celebrated
